sentences.sentence: I can arrogantly say: I am a world citizen!
sentences.translation: 我可以傲慢地说：我是世界公民！

sentences.sentence: One day the dog arrogantly says: “How grand I am!
sentences.translation: 一天，狗骄傲地说着；‘我是多么重要啊！

sentences.sentence: "I can jump higher than anyone else." The flea said arrogantly.
sentences.translation: “我能跳得比任何人都高。”跳蚤傲慢地说。
